statements: SELECT * FROM settings;
SELECT console_id, config_key FROM settings;
SELECT config_key, console_id FROM settings;
SELECT * FROM settings WHERE console_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614175000';
SELECT * FROM settings ORDER BY config_key DESC;
SELECT * FROM settings WHERE console_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT console_id, config_key FROM settings WHERE config_key LIKE 'theme%';
SELECT DISTINCT console_id FROM settings ORDER BY console_id DESC;
SELECT console_id, config_value FROM settings WHERE config_key = 'background_color' ORDER BY console_id ASC, config_value DESC;
SELECT console_id, COUNT(config_key) AS config_count FROM settings GROUP BY console_id HAVING config_count > 1 ORDER BY config_count DESC;
SELECT setting_value, setting_name FROM console_settings WHERE console_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM console_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%color%';
SELECT console_name FROM console ORDER BY console_name DESC;
SELECT console_name, console_id FROM console ORDER BY console_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT console_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM console_settings WHERE setting_value = 'on';
SELECT console_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM console_settings WHERE setting_name = 'theme' ORDER BY console_id ASC;
SELECT console_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM console_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%color%' ORDER BY setting_name DESC;
SELECT console_id, console_name FROM console ORDER BY console_name DESC, console_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM console_settings JOIN console ON console_settings.console_id = console.console_id WHERE console_name = 'Xbox' ORDER BY setting_value ASC, console_id DESC;

SELECT console_id, console_name, setting_name FROM console JOIN console_settings ON console.console_id = console_settings.console_id WHERE setting_name = 'sound' ORDER BY setting_name ASC, console_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM console_settings;
SELECT console_name, resolution FROM console_settings WHERE console_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, graphics_quality FROM game_settings ORDER BY game_name DESC;
SELECT console_name, game_name FROM console_settings JOIN console_game_mapping ON console_settings.console_id = console_game_mapping.console_id WHERE console_settings.console_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE controls = 'Keyboard';
SELECT * FROM console_settings WHERE console_id = 1;
SELECT console_name, resolution FROM console_settings WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT game_name, graphics_quality FROM game_settings WHERE graphics_quality = 'High';

SELECT console_name, resolution, game_name, controls FROM console_settings JOIN console_game_mapping ON console_settings.console_id = console_game_mapping.console_id JOIN game_settings ON console_game_mapping.game_id = game_settings.game_id;

SELECT console_name, resolution, game_name, graphics_quality FROM console_settings JOIN console_game_mapping ON console_settings.console_id = console_game_mapping.console_id JOIN game_settings ON console_game_mapping.game_id = game_settings.game_id WHERE controls = 'Keyboard';
SELECT * FROM console_settings;
SELECT console_id, resolution, sound_effects_enabled FROM console_settings;
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE difficulty = 'Medium';
SELECT player_id, control_scheme, language FROM player_settings ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT leaderboard_id, player_id, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 1000;
SELECT * FROM player_settings WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT console_id, resolution FROM console_settings WHERE sound_effects_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, control_scheme, language FROM player_settings WHERE game_id = 5;
SELECT leaderboard_id, score, player_id, game_id FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT game_id, difficulty, starting_level FROM game_settings WHERE difficulty = 'Hard' AND starting_level > 5;
SELECT console_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM game_settings_xbox;
SELECT setting_name, console_id, setting_value FROM game_settings_ps;
SELECT setting_value, setting_name, console_id FROM game_settings_nintendo;
SELECT console_id, setting_value, setting_name FROM game_settings_pc;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value, console_id FROM game_settings_mobile;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM game_settings_xbox WHERE console_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM game_settings_ps WHERE setting_name = 'graphics';
SELECT console_id, setting_name FROM game_settings_nintendo WHERE setting_value = 'high';
SELECT * FROM game_settings_pc WHERE console_id = 3 AND setting_name = 'sound';
SELECT console_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM game_settings_mobile WHERE setting_name = 'controls' ORDER BY console_id DESC;
